4.title: ğŸª˜ Design Pillars ğŸª˜
4.content: These pillars help drive decisions in all aspects of the game design. ğŸ—ï¸ Hyper Accessible . The game should support as many people as possible, on as many devices as possible, in as many situations as possible. ğŸ”“ Simplistic one touch (mobile) or one hand (keyboard/controller) controls. ğŸ”“ Accessible graphics that are clear and understandable at a glance. ğŸ”“ Low hardware requirements (Older phones, laptops, â€¦). ğŸ”“ Highly device and OS accessible (Win, Mac, Linux, iPhone, Android). ğŸ”“ No segregating of players based on experience, skill, or any other factors. ğŸ”“ Allow anyone to join any team at any time, no exclusionary mechanics. ğŸ”“ No textual communications, instead use pictoral and graphical communications. ğŸ”“ Modes of playing that allow low-skilled players and high-skilled players. ğŸ”“ Modes of playing that allow for players to be support focused opposed to combat focused. ğŸ”“ Low download requirements for low bandwidth tolerance. ğŸ”“ Consideration for individuals with visual and movement impairments. ğŸ˜ï¸ Community Engageable . The game should allow communities to easily engage with it and allows them to strengthen bonds through shared experiences and stories. ğŸ‘ª Easily shareable via a link. ğŸ‘ª Joining a session requires no authentication or personally identifying information. ğŸ‘ª Joining immediately places you with the person who invited you. ğŸ‘ª Able to join at any point in the session. ğŸ‘ª Every extra player is a bonus, never a liability. ğŸ‘ª Huge limit on the player count (100+), allowing for large communities. ğŸ‘ª Shareable moments that can be distributed in the community. ğŸ‘ª Cooperative driven mechanics. ğŸ‘ª Gameplay moments that require the players to collaborate and communicate. ğŸ˜„ Casually Enjoyable . The game should be enjoyed in casual settings, it should be stress relieving rather than stress building, and it should be easily engaged with. ğŸ¥³ Short session length, up to 15-minutes. ğŸ¥³ Low learning curve, medium mastery curve. ğŸ¥³ Multi-taskable, allowing people to have split attention while playing. ğŸ¥³ Themes and enemies that are whimsical and light fantasy. ğŸ¥³ No gratiuitous violence, sexual or mature content. ğŸ¥³ No overly complicated or devisive content. ğŸ¥³ Only positive reinforcement, never any punishments or penalties. ğŸ¥³ Allow people to disengage and re-engage at a whim with no penalties.

5.title: ğŸƒ Player Motivations ğŸƒ
5.content: ğŸ¤ Cooperation . Players are highly motivated to join as a community, to seek each other out, and to team up. Players progress faster in groups and are able to directly help each other using abilities. The game is optimally played with a pre-existing community, but solo players can join any team with no restrictions. ğŸ† Competition . Teams will have statisticsğŸ“Š of individual performance (damage, healing, â€¦) displayed at all times which will motivate competitive players to top the team leaderboard. This allows shareable moments within communities. ğŸ”¥ Destruction . The combat will cause over the top destruction to the environment and enemie, in a fireworks-display comical manner. It should be suprising, enjoyable, and candy for your eyes. ğŸ’ª Progression . In a 15 minute session players will rapidly progress in their class. In the metagame players can empower their class by expending earned currency. ğŸ” Discovery . Players will be able to discover a variety of unique and different environments, classes, achievements, and enemies over their sessions.

6.title: ğŸ› ï¸ Main Mechanics ğŸ› ï¸
6.content: ğŸ§­ 2D Movement . Players can move around the world in the horizontal plane, ie unable to jump or move vertically. ğŸ—¡ï¸ Auto Attacks . Characters will attack the nearest threat automatically, players need not aim attacks or choose targets. This is a characteristic mechanic of the bullet-heaven genre. ğŸ”¥ Character classes have unique abilities . Each character class has unique abilities that can be used to directly help team mates. For example: ğŸ›¡ï¸ Paladin: Block and reflect attacks. ğŸ¦ Tamer: Can tame invaders into friendly pets. ğŸŒ· Druid: Can grow defensive fauna. âš ï¸ Telegraphed abilities and attacks . All abilities and attacks, from friends or enemies, will be telegraphed to allow the players to react to it. Players are able to get out of the way of enemy attacks and ensure they take advantage of any team mates abilities (eg a heal). ğŸ’ª Rapid Progression and ability unlocks . At the start of each session, a character is at level 1 and can rapidly climb to a maximum level of 10 during a 15 minute session. Each level provides one new ability, chosen from a set of five random abilities. Players will all level up at the same time and will see the abilities other players choose, so they can strategize to choose the same abilities or have a mixture of abilities on the team. ğŸ™ Stacked abilities . When a player uses an ability, such as an area based heal, other players will have the opportunity to stack their ability on top of it. This allows for stronger abilities that are only possible with numerous collaborating team mates. For example, an area based heal that has numerous stacks will have a wider area of effect and healing potency.

7.title: ğŸŒ€ Gameplay Loop ğŸŒ€
7.content: %%{init: {'theme':'dark'}}%% stateDiagram-v2 direction TB accTitle: Gameloop state "Explore the void ğŸ§™" as EXPLORE state "Find players ğŸ§ğŸ§" as FIND_P state "Invite players ğŸ”—" as INVITE_P state "Grow Sanctuary ğŸŒ±" as GROW_S state "Gain Life Essence ğŸŒ¿" as GAIN_LE state "Level Up â¬†ï¸" as LVL_P state "Defend Sanctuary ğŸ›¡ï¸ğŸŒ±" as DEFND_S state "Defeat Void Invaders ğŸ‘¹ğŸ¸ğŸ§Œ" as DEFEAT_E state "ğŸ’€ Defeated ğŸ’€" as DEFEATED state "More players find and join the sanctuary ğŸ§ğŸ§" as FIND_S state "Invaders get stronger ğŸ’ªğŸ‘¹" as LVL_I classDef def fill:black,color:white,font-weight:bold,stroke:purple classDef team fill:black,color:white,font-weight:bold,stroke:blue classDef sanct fill:black,color:white,font-weight:bold,stroke:green classDef invader fill:black,color:white,font-weight:bold,stroke:red classDef loss fill:black,color:white,font-weight:bold,stroke:red,stroke-width:3 class EXPLORE def class FIND_P,INVITE_P,FIND_S team class GROW_S,GAIN_LE,DEFND_S,LVL_P sanct class DEFEAT_E,LVL_I invader class DEFEATED loss note left of GAIN_LE Also used for metagame progression end note note right of FIND_S Solo players or small teams looking for a larger team end note [*] --> EXPLORE EXPLORE --> FIND_P EXPLORE --> INVITE_P FIND_P --> GROW_S INVITE_P --> GROW_S: void-survivors.com/Join-me/Pewdiepie GROW_S --> GAIN_LE GAIN_LE --> LVL_P: Life essenceğŸŒ¿ acts as experience points LVL_P --> DEFND_S DEFND_S --> DEFEATED: ğŸ–¤ğŸ–¤ğŸ–¤ DEFND_S --> DEFEAT_E: ğŸ’–ğŸ–¤ğŸ–¤ DEFEAT_E --> LVL_I: The larger the ğŸŒ± the stronger invaders LVL_I --> FIND_S FIND_S --> GROW_S: The larger the ğŸŒ± the easier to find .

8.title: ğŸ¯ Playersâ€™ Goal ğŸ¯
8.content: During a session the playersâ€™ğŸ§™ goal is to gain as much life essenceğŸŒ¿ as possible. Life essence allows their character to level upğŸ’ª, and is used to unlock character buffs in the metagame. The longer the player is able to defend the sanctuaryğŸŒ±, the more life essence is gained. Players are able to last longer by: . | Finding playersğŸ§™ to team up which adds more defendersğŸ›¡ï¸ to the sanctuaryğŸŒ±. Players can find other players by joining an existing team, by inviting them via a linkğŸ”—, or by finding them in the void. | Gathering life essenceğŸŒ¿ from the sanctuary efficently by collecting it between waves of invaders and by living longer by avoiding taking damageğŸ’– from invadersğŸ‘¹. | Starting strongerğŸ’ª by upgrading character classes in the metagame using gained life essenceğŸŒ¿. | .

9.title: ğŸ’ª Meta Game Loop ğŸ’ª
9.content: %%{init: {'theme':'dark'}}%% stateDiagram-v2 direction TB accTitle: Metagame loop state "Play ğŸ“±ğŸ®âŒ¨ï¸" as PLAY state "Gain Life Essence ğŸŒ¿" as GET_LE state "ğŸ’€ Defeated ğŸ’€" as DEFEATED state "Unlock achievements ğŸ†" as ACHIEVE state "Upgrade classğŸ’ª by spending life essenceğŸŒ¿" as UPGRADE classDef def fill:black,color:white,font-weight:bold,stroke:purple classDef upgrade fill:black,color:white,font-weight:bold,stroke:gold classDef sanct fill:black,color:white,font-weight:bold,stroke:green classDef loss fill:black,color:white,font-weight:bold,stroke:red class PLAY def class GET_LE sanct class ACHIEVE upgrade class UPGRADE upgrade class DEFEATED loss PLAY --> GET_LE GET_LE --> DEFEATED DEFEATED --> ACHIEVE: Based on personal performanceğŸ“Š ACHIEVE --> UPGRADE: Spend life essenceğŸŒ¿ UPGRADE --> PLAY: Allows lasting longerğŸ’ª .

10.title: ğŸ§ğŸ§ğŸ§™ Character Classes ğŸ§™ğŸ§ğŸ§
10.content: Each class has a unique ability which provides utility and value to a team which means that playerâ€™s are always happy to see another player join the team. ğŸ›¡ï¸ Paladin : Medium Skill . Paladins are able to block incoming projectiles and attacks. Paladins will position themselves between invaders and team mates, providing a barrier for team mates. With upgrades, Paladins are able to reflect projectiles at the attacker. Session Unlockable Abilities: Invulnerability, Wall of shields, Fire circle. â¤ï¸â€ğŸ©¹ Healer : Low Skill . Healers are able to add a temporary shield to any team mate, absorbing one damage, and heal team mates. Healers will be mobile, running around and healing those in need, and adding shields to Paladinâ€™s. This class is not combat focused and provides those who would find combat stressful a mode of playing. With upgrades, a healer can stave off death of a team mate by resurrecting them within a small window of their defeat. Session Unlockable Abilities: Area heal, Area shield, Area resurrect. ğŸ¹ Archer : Low Skill . Archers are able to deal damage in a wide area and are able to push enemies back out of the sanctuary. Archers will focus on tackling groups of invaders and using their knock-back effect to push larger threatening invaders back out of the sanctuary, allowing for team mates to reposition themselves before fighting it. With upgrades, archers can use knock backs with more utility including stunning enemies against terrain. Session Unlockable Abilities: Volley, Fire arrows, Sniper. ğŸ—¡ï¸ Rogue : High Skill . Rogues are able to deal great amounts of damage to single targets and are able to sneak around behind invader lines. Rogues will focus on tackling large invaders with high health by sneaking up to them and quickly dispatching them and retreating before taking damage by surrounding invaders. With upgrades, rogues can become more mobile allowing them to be agile to a rapidly changing environment. Session Unlockable Abilities: Poison bomb, Sticky bomb, Smoke bomb. ğŸ”¥ Elementalist : Medium Skill . Elementalists are able absorb environmental effects, such as a fire spreading through the sanctuary which would reduce the life essence gained, and empower team mates with elemental damage. Elementalists will be on damage control, prioritizing the absorption of elemental effects to mitigate damage to the sanctuary. Once absorbed sufficent elemental essence, they can empower a team mate with it (such as lighting a Paladins sword on fire) allowing that team mate to inflict increased damage. This class is not combat focused and provides those who would find combat stressful a mode of playing. With upgrades, an elementalist can absorb elemental effects from invaders which results in their attacks not being empowered by elemental effects and thus reducing their impact on the sanctuary. Session Unlockable Abilities: Area absorb, Area fire buff, Meteor. ğŸª¢ Controller : High Skill . Controllers are able to tie invaders up, reducing their ability to attack team mates and the sanctuary. Controllers will attempt to focus specifically threatening invaders to mitigate their potential for damage. Controllers will work together to tie up large invaders. With upgrades, a controller can drag a tied up invader back to team mates for disposal before the effect wares off. Session Unlockable Abilities: Area slowing trap, Area confuse trap, Area lasoo. ğŸ¦ Tamer : Low Skill . Tamers are able to tame void invaders by converting them into friendly pets, which will autonomously defend the sanctuary from invaders. Tamers will focus on invaders that are tied up, which will not be able to escape their range and provide them with safety from damage. Tamers will work together to tame large invaders. This class is not combat focused and provides those who would find combat stressful a mode of playing. With upgrades, a tamer can express limited control over pets - such as directing it to follow and defend the tamer. Session Unlockable Abilities: Empower pets, Summon pets, Upgrade pets. ğŸŒ· Druid : Low Skill . Druids are able to grow the size of the sanctuary faster than all other classes. Druids are able to grow unique fauna that can help with the defense of the sanctuary, such as barriers and static carnivorous plants which will attack invaders. Druids will focus on growing the sanctuary, to maximise on life essence production, and setting up defensible areas that the group can defend from more effectively. With upgrades, a druid can grow more types of fauna that have different utilities. Session Unlockable Abilities: Area sanctuary growth, Grow giant carnivorous plant, Grow giant defensive plant.

20.title: Overview
20.content: Void Survivors* is an atmospheric free-to-play social dungeon crawling multiplayer game where hundreds of players group together to survive for as long as possible against incresingly difficult waves of whimsical fantasy monsters. * Working title . The game is currently in pre-production and Universe Builders are seeking funding to be able to complete Pre-Production. ğŸ¨ Art Style . 2.5D, fixed camera, isometric, fantasy, voxels . ğŸ› ï¸ Mechanics . | Movement in 2D | Auto-target combat | Telegraphed attacks | Roles (Tank, Healer, DPS, Crowd Control, â€¦) | . ğŸ•¹ï¸ Player Motivations . ğŸ¤ Â  Cooperation ğŸ† Â  Competition ğŸ”¥ Â  Destruction ğŸ’ª Â  Progression ğŸ” Â  Discovery . ğŸ’­ Player Fantasies . | Playing and interacting with large groups of players (100+) to overcome challenges | Playing an impactful role in a group | Playing with friends and existing communities | Playing with popular streamers | . âŒ› Session Length . 15 minutes . ğŸ‘ª Target Market . ğŸ“º Target Platforms . ğŸŒ Web Browsers Â Â Â Â Chrome for Linux, Windows, MacOSX, Android, iPhone, Smart TVâ€™s Â Â Â Â Firefox for Linux, Windows, MacOSX, Android Â Â Â Â Safari for MacOSX, iPhone . ğŸ“º Controls . âŒ¨ï¸ Â  WASD or Arrows ğŸ® Â  Joystick ğŸ“± Â  One touch controls . ğŸ“‡ Tags . MMO, Multiplayer, Cooperative, Touch screen support, Full controller support, In-App Purchases, RPG, Achievements. ğŸ‘‰ Gameplay Inspirations . | Vampire Survivors | Soulstone Survivors | World of Warcraft - Raids | .

22.title: Home
22.content: Universe Builders is a game development studio located in Melbourne Australia focusing on the development of loneliness-busting highly accessibile massively multiplayer games for the Web, Mobile, Windows, Linux, and PC. Universe Builders is currently seeking funding for their first title - Void Survivors. Check out all the documentation for Void Survivors here .

Target: Existing communities . | Create own community . | GTFO | D&D | . | .

26.title: Monetization
26.content: Monetization is driven by two strategies: . | Class unlocks. | Character customization. | . The following will be part of the monetization: âœ… No loot boxes or other gambling mechanics. âœ… No pay-to-win mechanics. âœ… No pay-to-earn mechanics. âœ… No cryptocurrency or NFTs. âœ… No data harvesting or selling of user data.

27.title: Class Unlocks
27.content: Players will have the option for playing a variety of free classes, including Paladin ğŸ›¡ï¸, Healer â¤ï¸â€ğŸ©¹, Archer ğŸ¹, and Rogue ğŸ—¡ï¸. More exotic classes will be unlockable through a purchasing option. Players are able to change classes at any time during a session. This allows the player to be dynamic to the needs of the team and to their current situation, eg if a player is in a tight spot surrounded by fire they can switch to the elementalist class ğŸ”¥ to absorb the fire through the elementalist ability and escape safely. Classes will reach a maximum progression and playerâ€™s can extend their progression in the game by purchasing new classes. This provides three motivations for the player to purchase a class: . | Increases survivability due to having more utility. | Increases value to team due to being able to change to class that the team is lacking. | Increased progression in the game. | . As the game is supported new classes will be released.

28.title: Character Customization
28.content: Players will want to express their individuality, especially in larger groups where they may get lost in a crowd of other players. Players will be able purchase skins to customize their characters. Each class will have unique skins, allowing a player to purchase unique looks for each of their classes.

30.title: ğŸ“– Narrative Direction
30.content: . | Players play in a void and spawn life around them. The longer they stay in one spot the more lush the life becomes, the larger it becomes, but the more it attracts the void to lash back against it. | All about cooperation, and banding together . | Inspiration: The void in Shadow and Bone. | . It begs to question, with enough players spreading bringing into the void life would the void be quenched entirely? .

38.content: ğŸ  Melbourne, Australia. ğŸ“§ jk@universe.builders ğŸ“ 0450215144 ğŸ“‡ LinkedIn .

39.title: Bio
39.content: James Knight is a lifelong multiplayer and MMO addict fan, having played almost every MMO and most online multiplayer games, and has dedicated his entire career to working with the most innovative multiplayer game and technology developers in the industry. He is the founder and currently sole developer at Universe Builders. He has over 10 years professional experience in the gamesâ€™ industry and over 3 years as a university lecturer. Pivoting from game design and 3D animation he transitioned into engineering and then product management roles, and still maintains a passion for design and art. He holds 2 bachelors degrees and has worked in several different industry roles including engineering, design, and development management.
